001package imagingbook.pub.edgepreservingfilters;
002
003import imagingbook.lib.image.access.OutOfBoundsStrategy;
004import imagingbook.lib.util.ParameterBundle;
005
006public interface KuwaharaF {
007
008        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
009                /** Radius of the filter (should be even) */
010                public int radius = 2;
011                /** Threshold on sigma to avoid banding in flat regions */
012                public double tsigma = 5.0;
013                /** Out-of-bounds strategy */
014                public OutOfBoundsStrategy obs = OutOfBoundsStrategy.NearestBorder;
015        }
016
017}
